items.title: Greater belief inspiring British progress - Cairess

items.title: 'Football doesn't need to take lives' - McQueen daughters on inquest
items.summary: Repeatedly heading footballs is "likely" to have contributed to the brain disease which was a factor in the death of former Scotland and Manchester United footballer Gordon McQueen, an inquest found. His daughters spoke after the verdict.

items.title: Internal chats show how social media companies discussed teen engagement
items.summary: Recently released documents show the big business opportunity that social media companies saw in recruiting teens to their platforms and how they discussed risks that heavy digital engagement could pose. The documents were released last week as part of a major set of trials brought by school distriâ€¦

items.title: Mac Mini M4 is on sale for just $499, defying the odds as PCs become more expensive â€” save $100 on performant machine with 16GB of unified memory
items.summary: The Mac mini M4 is currently on sale on Amazon for $499, making one of the cheapest ways to get into the Apple ecosystem even much more affordable.

items.title: OpenAI is working out how much to charge for ChatGPT ads
items.summary: OpenAI is reportedly asking a high price to advertise on ChatGPT, around $60 per 1,000 views, or triple what ads on Meta's platform usually cost, according to The Information. Despite the higher price, OpenAI won't be offering advertisers the same level of detailed information that Google and Meta â€¦

items.title: Payment processors were against CSAM until Grok started making it
items.summary: For many years, credit card companies and other payment methods were aggressive about policing child sexual abuse material. Then, Elon Musk's Grok started undressing children on X. The Center for Countering Digital Hate found 101 sexualized images of children as part of its sample of 20,000 images â€¦

items.summary: Microsoft is announcing a successor to its first in-house AI chip today, the Maia 200. items.title: AMD's Ryzen 7 9850X3D could save you hundreds on your new build during the RAM crisis â€” CPU tech nearly eliminates the performance difference between cheap and expensive RAM
items.summary: AMD has just reminded us that its X3D CPUs don't require fast memory speeds. In a new marketing slide for the upcoming Ryzen 7 9850X3D, we see only a 1% difference in average FPS across five games. We've known about this phenomenon since the DDR4-era 5800X3D, but this marks the first time AMD is exâ€¦

items.title: Shopper walks out with a $4.99 Radeon RX 5700 XT GPU from Goodwill â€” thrift stores are the hidden goldmines amid the AI-driven GPU crisis
items.summary: Launched initially as a strong 1080p and 1440p gaming card, the Radeon RX 5700 XT was revived with basic maintenance after being picked up for just $4.99.

items.title: $3,000 RTX 5090 delivery brings rocks, a towel, and broken dreams â€” unboxing nightmare on an expensive GPU bought from Amazon Resale
